title: Part 2: Piers Morgan (ACS July 20)
itunes:title: Part 2: Piers Morgan (ACS July 20)
description:
Adam sits down one on one with journalist and host, Piers Morgan, to talk about his show ‘Piers Morgan Uncensored’. They talk about the comments they made about each other a few years ago and share their perspectives on what happened. Piers tells the story of how comments he made about his once friend, Meghan Markle, got him cancelled and the two discuss how cancel culture is affecting society.
